resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

Login Screen: This screen allows users to authenticate themselves by entering their username and password. Upon successful login, users gain access to the app's main features.


Dashboard Screen: After logging in, users are directed to the Dashboard Screen, where they can view a comprehensive list of entities retrieved from the API. This screen provides a summary and overview of the available entities.


Details Screen: When a user selects an entity from the Dashboard, they are taken to the Details Screen. This screen presents in-depth information about the selected entity, including all relevant details and data.
